name: EduKart.com
overview:
EduKart.com is one of India’s upcoming online education portal that delivers industry relevant certificate courses for students pursuing higher education and working professionals.

EduKart.com offers certificate courses in Retail Management, Financial Management, Digital Marketing and Programming languages like Java Script and PHP.

To support the learner, EduKart.com offers unlimited telephonic support to resolve academic queries during the course of the show. The learners are also provided with CDs of the courses to support the learning without availability of high speed Internet. The certificate issued at the end of the course carries the Rating of Employment for that particular course and signals the readiness of the certificate holder to the employers.
